extendedInfo.description: AutoCheck users can now access AutoCheck vehicle history reports from their mobile device. After downloading and launching the application, log in using your email and password to enter a VIN to request a report, review your vehicle report history and email customer service. If you do not have an account with AutoCheck, follow the link on the main page to subscribe to the service.This application contains AutoCheck's complete Glossary of terms and FAQ.Features Include:- Scan VIN Barcodes- VIN Search functionality- Immediate access to AutoCheck Vehicle History Reports- Search History storage for future reviewBy Experian Information Solutions, Inc.

reviews.title: Like everyone else
reviews.comment: This app is garbage.... I wanted to go look at some cars to and check the VIN.... Guess not...
reviews.author: Maurice Wright Jr.

reviews.title: This app is a piece of crap.
reviews.comment: I purchased the unlimited deal on the website which is OK, gives the info you need, but when you want to go \"mobile\" this flippin app just gets stuck and locks itself up.  You are able to sign in with the log in credentials you created at the website, but when you try to input the VIN info, a little flag pups up and say some bullshit excuse like \" unable to  connect\" or some similar crap. Tried to uninstall and re-install but goes back to the same BS.  Major F*R*U*S*T*R*A*T*I*O*N!!!!!
reviews.author: Mauricio Moreno

reviews.title: Not working!
reviews.comment: Once upon a time this worked quite well; not anymore! Please fix the mobile app!
reviews.author: David Sellers

reviews.title: Crap. Doesn\'t even work
reviews.comment: It crashes everytime.  Worthless app.
reviews.author: Steve S. Choo

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: Works fine for me.
reviews.author: Pat Thompson

reviews.title: Works Good on Samsung Note2 !!!
reviews.comment: Works fine on Samsung Note 2, running Android version 4.1.2  .
reviews.author: Elgin Alexander

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: They have the best prices for checks as well as an excellent app. I use it all the time when I purchase cars and the scan VIN works great when at the dealers/vendor. Thanks!
reviews.author: Steve B

reviews.title: Smh
reviews.comment: Wow!  What a useless app. It sucks in so many ways. Please fix it or just take it down. Thanks
reviews.author: Samuel Joshua

reviews.title: Works flawlessly!
reviews.comment: App worked as advertised.  Scanned VINs and pulled in the reports to my phone.  I pulled multiple reports at several different dealerships.  All with no problems.  I was using the \"unlimited reports in 30 days\" plan purchased at Auto Check dot com.
reviews.author: Jef Huntington

reviews.title: WORKS PERFECTLY!
reviews.comment: I read everyones negative comments but I thought I\'d still try it and it works flawlessly. I\'m able to put the vin number manually or scan it with no problems and the report comes up in seconds. I\'m using the first gen DROID X, so I thought I would have issues but I didn\'t. Of course you need to subscribe for $44.99 for unlimited reports which is better then carfax which is $54.99 for unlimited reports, which technically means 5 vin reports. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
reviews.author: Francisco Rosales

reviews.title: It works
reviews.comment: It works fine for me.
reviews.author: Sher Kong

reviews.title: poor
reviews.comment: scanner doesn\'t work on samsung note 2!!! says unexpected site error has occurred. FIX!!
reviews.author: Brody B

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Entered Vin never could get reports to load
reviews.author: Doug Rosenfeld

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: Has a ridiculously short limit on length of email address. What am I supposed to do? Get a special purpose email address for this app? Uninstalling
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HTC Evo
reviews.comment: Need to fix the login issue. Re-entering info every time is very annoying. Needs to at least save login info until you exit the program.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hang on loading but never shows record
reviews.comment: Paid the AutoCheck Unlimited Reports $44.99 for 30 days. I\'m in a search for a used car for the last 2 days. I entered 3 VIN of the cars that I\'m interested but it keeps hang on the \"loading report\", I waited up to 10 min each and it never shows the report. I\'m using Android 4.1 Jelly Bean on HTC One X+ (at&t). I\'m going to ask my  money back. But most likely I will not get it back. Don\'t waste your time and money. I learned my lesson. I hope it helped you.
reviews.author: Rami Asherov

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work use car fax
reviews.comment: I had this last year and it worked great. Downloaded again yesterday and it just loads and loads and loads! Going to call for refund tomorrow.
reviews.author: Dave Weaver

reviews.title: WTF?
reviews.comment: Autocheck once was better than carfax and gave much more detail than Carfax.  Now it shows the last reported mileage was on the sale date for vehicles
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on HTC EVO
reviews.comment: I updated my phone to the ice cream sandwich and this app fails to work any longer ...VERY DISAPPOINTED !  PLEASE MAKE AN UPDATE !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not working on HTC LTE from Sprint
reviews.comment: This app used to work great on my HTC EVO 4g... But now it doesn\'t work on the HTC LTE...I get a \"invalid account\" message, yet my account works fine on the website.  I emailed customer service several times and I haven\'t received any responses.
reviews.author: A Google User
